name: Gods and Myths
description:
Gods and Myths it's an educational game where the player can discover more about the Ancient Greek gods and goddesses. The application's aim is to aproach  the study of the mythology in a different way, to expand educational methods in secondary school. 

The user is a myths scholar and the journey begin in the library where it is possible to find out some special books that make the user able to travel the myths worlds. In this version of the application 2 books regarding Athena are interactable. 

Reaching some goals, the myths are narrated during every experience. At the end of every myth's narration, a quiz is presented, to test the user's comprehension.

This demo project was created within the Virtual Reality course of the Cinema and Media Engineering faculty (a.y. 2021/2022).                Politecnico di Torino.

CONTROLS

Movements: Use WASD to move

Camera: Use Mouse to rotate camera

Interact w/ Objects: Use Right click to Grab & Left click to Drop

Jump: Use SPACE to Jump

Pause Game: Use M to pause the game
